elevatorDetail.confirmResetDoor: Reset door cycle for this elevator?
elevatorDetail.confirmOutOfService: Set this elevator out of service?

elevatorAlarms.title: Active Alarms
elevatorAlarms.descTrapped: Passenger trapped between floor 8 and 9. Elevator stopped mid-shaft. Intercom active.
elevatorAlarms.descOverload: Load sensor reports 92% capacity. Trip aborted. Passengers asked to reduce load.
elevatorAlarms.descCommTimeout: Controller communication lost for 45s. Auto-recovered. Check network stability.
elevatorAlarms.descEmergency: Emergency button pressed. False alarm - child pressed button accidentally.
elevatorAlarms.descDoorObstruction: Door sensor triggered 3 times in 10 minutes. Possible debris or misalignment.
elevatorAlarms.descMotorVibration: Vibration sensor exceeded threshold. May indicate bearing wear.
elevatorAlarms.noteAnnouncementMade: Announcement made. Waiting for load reduction.
elevatorAlarms.noteChildPressed: Responded. Child pressed button by accident.
elevatorAlarms.noteVibrationReading: Reading at 1.2mm/s (threshold 1.0). Maintenance scheduled for tomorrow.

elevatorMaintenance.title: Maintenance
elevatorMaintenance.descDoorObstruction: Door sensor triggers every 3rd cycle. Debris suspected in track. Clean and recalibrate.
elevatorMaintenance.descMotorVibration: Vibration sensor reading 1.2 mm/s (threshold 1.0). Possible bearing wear.
elevatorMaintenance.descCommTimeout: Controller lost comm 3 times this week. Check network and firmware.
elevatorMaintenance.descIntercomNoise: Passenger reported static on intercom during entrapment. Clean contacts.
elevatorMaintenance.descMonthlyInspection: Routine monthly inspection per regulation. All systems check.
elevatorMaintenance.descLevelMisalignment: Car stops 12mm above floor level at floor 15. Recalibrated position encoder.
elevatorMaintenance.logStartedWork: Started work. Elevator taken out of service.
elevatorMaintenance.logFoundMetalShaving: Found metal shaving in door track.
elevatorMaintenance.logInspectedMotor: Inspected motor. Bearing shows wear marks.

robotAlerts.title: Active Alerts
robotAlerts.checkSafetyStop: If safety risk → emergency stop + dispatch staff
robotAlerts.noteAutoRecall: Auto-recalled to dock due to low battery
robotAlerts.noteWifiWeak: WiFi signal weak in hallway area
